thread.title: JC
thread.title_full: Country Attire Ltd. (www.countryattire.com) reviewed by JC

author: JC
title: JC
text: I was looking for a Bedale and found that Country Attire gave the best price and was surprised to receive additional 10% discount at checkout, great deal. Item arrived a couple of working days later and very happy with it.
